definition: surname Yun/abbr. for Yunnan Province 雲南省|云南省[Yun2 nan2 Sheng3]
flower/earlobe/fig. item on both sides/classifier for flowers, clouds etc

sentences.english: Despite the clouds, the Matterhorn still was a great piece of rock to look at.
sentences.chinese: 除了云朵外，马特宏峰看上去始终是块壮观的石头。

sentences.english: See the cloud floating back and forth.
The sky and clouds are full of yellow.
sentences.chinese: 天壁和云朵盛满了黄色。

sentences.english: The rain falls from the clouds.
sentences.chinese: 雨就从云朵中飘了下来。

sentences.english: Clouds over Manitoba, Canada, are bathed in green light from an August 4 aurora.
sentences.chinese: 8月4日加拿大马尼巴托上空的云朵沐浴在绿光之中。

sentences.english: Such doubts have not stopped China claiming mastery over the clouds.
sentences.chinese: 这种怀疑并没有妨碍中国宣称已把云朵握在手中。

sentences.english: The sky so blue, so blue it covered like clouds like cotton candy.
sentences.chinese: 天空好蓝，蓝得遮住了那像棉花糖似的云朵。

sentences.english: Standing in the sky covered with clouds, feeling cool and comfortable comes from the forest.
sentences.chinese: 站在长满云朵的天空下，感觉来自林间的沁凉和舒适。

sentences.english: She said they felt like clouds, light and fluffy.
sentences.chinese: 她说那些肌肉就像云朵一样轻柔松软。

sentences.english: Clouds want to cover the fabulous sun.
sentences.chinese: 云朵想要遮蔽那轮惊艳的太阳。

sentences.english: It is afraid, but it seriously clouds umbrella.
sentences.chinese: 它害怕，但云朵认真地为它撑伞。

sentences.english: Above the clouds of the flesh and the stone.
sentences.chinese: 在那肉体与石头的云朵之上。

sentences.english: The light wind strewed it with beautiful shadows of clouds and trees.
sentences.chinese: 清风在其上筛落下云朵和树木的美丽的影子。

sentences.english: Blue ocean, cotton candy-like clouds cling to the golden paradise.
sentences.chinese: 蓝色的海洋，棉花糖般的云朵依偎着金色的天堂。

sentences.english: We are still under the same blue sky…
sentences.chinese: 水印的云朵，飘浮在蓝天上。

definition: Baiyun district of Guiyang city 貴陽市|贵阳市[Gui4 yang2 shi4], Guizhou/Baiyun district of Guangzhou city 廣州市|广州市[Guang3 zhou1 shi4], Guangdong
multicolored sunlight of sunrise or sunset
